info.name: ScintillaSearch
info.comment: Provides search functionality for use on Scintilla objects.

method.name: Find
method.comment: Searches for a specific text string.
method.prototype: ERROR ssFind(OBJECTPTR Object, LONG * Pos, LONG Flags)

input.param: The position to start searching from. Set to -1 to start from the cursor position. This parameter is updated with the byte position of the discovered string sequence.

description.p: Call Find to initiate a string search within the targeted Scintilla object. The method will scan for the first instance of the Text string sequence and return its position in Pos. The Flags parameter defines special options that affect the search process.
To find subsequent string matches, call one of either the Next or Prev methods.

input.param: The byte-position of the discovered string sequence is returned here.

description.p: Use Next to continue a search after calling the Find method. If a string sequence matching that of Text is discovered, its byte position will be returned in the Pos parameter. If a new match is not discovered then ERR_Search is returned to indicate an end to the search.

method.name: Prev
method.comment: Continues a text search in reverse.

input.param: The byte-position of the discovered string is returned here.

description.p: The Prev method operates under the same circumstances as Next, except that the search will be in reverse. Please refer to Next for further information.

field.name: End
field.comment: End of the current/most recent selection

description.p: Optional flags that affect the search process are specified here.

field.name: Scintilla
field.comment: Targets a Scintilla object for searching.

description.p: A Scintilla object must be targeted in this field in order to perform the search process.

field.name: Start
field.comment: Start of the current/most recent selection

field.name: Text
field.comment: The string sequence to search for.

description.p: This field defines the string sequence that will be searched for when calling either Find, Next or Prev.

constants.const: Search text is a regular expression.
The cursor is moved to the discovered string. If not set, the string is auto-selected.
Limit search to within the user's current selection.
Wrap search at the end of the document.
